sentences.sContent: He was so meticulous about everything.
sentences.sCn: 他对任何事情都很小心谨慎。

synos.tran: 一丝不苟的；小心翼翼的；拘泥小节的

remMethod.val: metic (害怕的) + ulous (多…的) → 做事小心翼翼的， 害怕出现差错 → 小心翼翼的

words.tran: 细致地；一丝不苟地；拘泥地

trans.tranOther: If you describe someone as meticulous, you mean that they do things very carefully and with great attention to detail
